structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Volunteer firefighters exempted from provisions of KRS 67A.6901 to 67A.6911.
law.text: Notwithstanding any provision of the Kentucky Revised Statutes to the contrary, the provisions of KRS 67A.6901 to 67A.6911 shall not be construed or interpreted to apply to volunteer firefighters.
law.history: Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 11, effective July 13, 2004.
